In a message dated 2/17/03 1:21:54 AM Central Standard Time, 
airly2002@... writes:


> "Yess, yess"hissed Hydras pleased while his eyes brighten with a sinester 
> shine "Your idea, Maxima open me a lot posibilities, that need to be 
> studied 
> carefully... Perceptor has a good mind and he can find out the way to up 
> grade the devise 'cause I remember kept the process to built it... Thanks 
> to 
> remember that, Maxima. That would be a good help... Even we can capture 
> some 
> maximals and forced to serve to Decepticon's cause"

Oooh, how she loved to create such havoc. A wicked smirk upon her feline face 
as she nodded. "Always of service, mighty Hydras." 

Ooooh, the possibilities. She would most definitely have fun here. At the 
moment, she would like it here. For now, she was curious as to what Hydras' 
next move would be. If she rushed out of here, she would bring up suspicion. 
How would she learn so much from 'the enemy' in so short of amount of time? 
She had to play her cards & play them well. She needed to remain here for a 
little while longer. 

Her optics turned to glance at the map. Again, her optics on the location 
where the Ark was. "I can hardly wait." she purred.

--part1_1cc.2e797a9.2b81e96b_boundary
